name: CI for Prosthesis AI Project

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: 3.10

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Run tests
        run: |
          # Ici vous pouvez ajouter des commandes pour ex√©cuter des tests, par exemple :
          # pytest tests/
          python -m unittest discover
          
      - name: Run preprocessing script
        run: |
          python data/preprocessed/preprocess_data.py
          
      - name: Build model (Optional)
        run: |
          python training/scripts/train_model.py
          
      - name: Push results (Optional)
        run: |
          git add .
          git commit -m "CI build: Update results"
          git push
